p: Post-fermentation corn oil and thin stillage were obtained from the industrial dry-grind corn bioethanol plant ENVIRAL a.s. (Leopoldov, Slovack Republic). The original feedstock was a yellow non-genetically modified corn ( Zea mays) grown in the Central East Europe region. Post-fermentation corn oil and thin stillage were sampled from the dry-grind corn ethanol facility as described previously [ 11].
